MMM: Measures the impact of various marketing channels
MTA: Measures the contribution of each touchpoint

MMM: Uses statistical models to allocate credit to channels
MTA: Uses algorithms to attribute credit to touchpoints
Utilizes real-time data (not necessarily a pre-req)

MMM: Good for analyzing long-term trends and large campaigns
MTA: Good for analyzing short-term and specific campaigns

MMM: Not as precise as MTA; limited to historical data
MTA: Can be complex; requires real-time data
